title: Sony Retreats From Video But Still Plans to Win the Game
text:
Sony is fighting the streaming war on multiple fronts. It is retreating from video, but the Japanese company is better positioned in games and music.

Sony posted record second-fiscal-quarter results on Wednesday, but the more interesting news came the day before: The company said it would shut down its television streaming service, PlayStation Vue. Cord-cutters can continue watching live TV and cable channels through the internet using the service. Content costs, however, have been rising and PlayStation Vue has struggled...
description: Sony is closing down its video streaming service. That is a tactical withdrawal to focus on its strengths.
